oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Garrett's Snuff Variety Show #334
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Garrett's Snuff sponsored Variety show, program numbers 334 and 335, featuring Happy Hal Burns (performer) and the Variety Gang (performers), Kid Clark (performer), the Love Brothers (performers), Lonnie Love (performer) and comedy skits performed by the cast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Happy Hal Burns; Kid Clark; Love Brothers; Lonnie Love
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Opening theme -- Opening statement -- Happy Hal Burns introduces the first tune -- The Story Of My Pappy's Whiskers (Happy Hal Burns and the Variety Gang) -- Garret's Snuff commercial -- Burns introduces the next tune -- Were You There When They Crucified My Lord (Happy Hal Burns and the Variety Gang) -- Comedy skit (cast) -- Down At Poker Joe's (Kid Clark accordion) -- Garret's Snuff commercial -- Where He Leads Me I Will Follow (Happy Hal Burns and the Variety Gang) -- Closing memory thought -- Closing theme -- [break] -- Opening theme -- Opening statement -- Comedy skit (cast) -- Burns introduces the first tune -- Nellie Was A Lady (Happy Hal Burns and the Variety Gang) -- Garret's Snuff commercial -- Friendless And Sad (Love Brothers) -- Comedy skit (cast) -- Burns talks and introduces the next tune -- I'll Get By Somehow (Lonnie Love) -- Garret's Snuff commercial) -- My Heavenly Home (Happy Hal Burns and the Variety Gang) -- Closing memory thought -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Garrett's Snuff and Dental Snuff Variety Program (Radio program); Burns; Hal; Love, Lonnie;
